President is laying out the choice for the American people – a choice between two different futures. #SOTU

Americans should know what data federal agencies collect and retain about them. (1/2) @FinancialCmte
HR 2571 will prohibit @CFPB from accessing or disclosing personal information about consumers unless they let them know what it is (2/2)
Americans are right to be suspicious of the federal government collecting data on anyone, especially without clearly notifying them. (1/2)
HR 2446 will replace single @CFPB Director with bipartisan 5-member commission to avoid unilateral activity by aggressive director. (2/2)
The last thing we need is another “czar.” Other bodies like SEC & FED are governed by a group of people, not a single director. (1/2)
